Desc.entry: A registered charity that supports people with learning disabilities who live at home with their families, to go out into the community and take part in leisure and social activities whilst giving their families a break. The scheme mainly runs through small group activities with support from volunteers and staff. Activities include trips to the theatre, meals out, cinema, pop concerts and bowling etc. Activities are held in the evenings and at weekends. Also offers inclusive fitness classes and line dancing.

DisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building
